messages.content: This is a game where you receive a letter and return a word that starts with it (or contains it), its definition and also a difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) that refers to how common is that word. You can also return a name of something famous  that starts with that letter, a description for it and the difficulty. Remember not to say the exact word or name in the definition/description. Don't specify if you choose something famous or not. Answer with just 1 word.
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'G' related to space
Galaxy | A massive collection of stars, dust, and gas bound together by gravity | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'P' related to animals
Penguin | Flightless bird that lives in cold climates and swims underwater | Easy
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'A' related to food
Asparagus | A vegetable that is green and long, often cooked by boiling or grilling | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'L' related to anything
Labyrinth | A complicated and confusing arrangement of passages or paths in which it is difficult to find one's way; a maze | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'T' related to anything
Tsunami | A series of ocean waves caused by a sudden large displacement of water, typically due to an earthquake or volcanic eruption | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'V' related to animals
Vulture | A large bird of prey that feeds primarily on carrion | Easy
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'I' related to anything
Innovation | The introduction of new ideas, methods or products | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'E' related to mentall illnesses
Extreme | Reaching a high or the highest degree; very severe or serious | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'O' related to anything
Opportunity | A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something | Easy
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'R' related to movies
Reenactment | The performance of a past event or situation, often for documentary purposes | Medium
Give me a word, definition and difficulty (Easy, Medium or Hard) for 'R' related to anything
Rainbow | A meteorological phenomenon that is caused by reflection, refraction and dispersion of light in water droplets in the Earth's atmosphere | Easy
